content: 99.co Event Property Savings Asked by AnonymousAsked on 25 May 2019As a millennial how much do I need to put a side each month to comfortably purchase my first property?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Junus EuTop Contributor (Sep)Level 8. WizardAnswered on 25 May 2019As a millennial who purchased my first property at 26, I would put aside at least 2k a month from the time I started working. Prior to purchasing property, I also spent my weekends looking at real estate to get a feel of the different neighbourhoods in Singapore.0 comments2
Paul HoLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 25 May 2019At least $500-800 a month for 5 years.0 comments1
